block.p: Kristen Lynn Roy and Morten Fugl Hansen were married yesterday by the Rev. Charles Simmons, an Episcopal priest, at St. Bartholomew's Church in New York.

The bride, 33, is based in New York, where she is a freelance field producer for television and video projects. Her credits include ''Pure Oxygen,'' which was a live show on the Oxygen cable television network, and more recently, ''The Condé Nast Traveler's Insider's Guide,'' a program for public television. She graduated from Colgate University. She is a daughter of Susan and Ronald P. Roy Jr. of Bonita Springs, Fla. Her father, who is retired, was the director of sales and marketing in Dalton, Ga., for the fibers division of the former Allied Signal Corporation.
